channel.title: How can i share files with somebody else?
channel.description:
how can i share them so they can host it also?
i need them to be able to run it etc.. is this possible?
also be able to edit client.java and other files and make them work on the server. :)

item.title: How can i share files with somebody else?
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

And that’s why you dont make backups on your computer rofl.

USB Flash Drives FTW?

Read full topic

item.title: How can i share files with somebody else?
item.dc:creator: @Got_Java Got Java?
item.description:
@Got_Java wrote:

[quote=“Lazer23, post:2, topic:124105”]No, it’s not possible. Seriously, don’t make me get into details.[br][size=1]Posted on: July 17, 2007, 02:36:13 AM[/size][hr]Fine, I’ll get into details.

Okay, your server is run off the files on your computer, and data is periodically saved onto documents and such on their computer. If you were to simply give him the files and all that you would be reseting the server in a way… god I’m so tired somebody finish this up for me?[/quote]
this is possible Lazer23 so don’t go saying things you don’t know.

flargie,
I’m pretty sure what you’re saying is you want to make it so you and another person can access your server files and still run the cmd prompt for your server, access character files, ect.
Well what you would need to do is buy a server. Kinda like a school server. It would cost a lot of money and would be very useless amount of money spent on something that is not going to be successful anyways. Well after buying a server that is online 24/7 you put your server in to its harddrive and run things and such. the only difference from it being your computer is you have to log in to sepret accounts and such on your computer. Very compilcated…No use…Don’t bother

Read full topic

item.title: How can i share files with somebody else?
item.dc:creator: @Lazer23 Lazer23
item.description:
@Lazer23 wrote:

No, it’s not possible. Seriously, don’t make me get into details.[br][size=1]Posted on: July 17, 2007, 02:36:13 AM[/size][hr]Fine, I’ll get into details.

Okay, your server is run off the files on your computer, and data is periodically saved onto documents and such on their computer. If you were to simply give him the files and all that you would be reseting the server in a way… god I’m so tired somebody finish this up for me?

Read full topic
